page.title: 06Sally Darcy ghost story.
page.content: Once there was a young girl called Sally. She decided to go for a walk across the railway line between Brithdir and Bargoed on the Great Western Railway line that runs from Cardiff to Brecon.She didnt hear the train coming. The train thundered around the bend and Sally was so engroced in picking flowers that she did not hear it. She was knocked over and killed. One of her legs was amputated and somehow it ran up the valley side Sally was found and buried but her leg was not found. The story goes that if you visit her grave at midnight on the twelfth day of the twelfth month, and run around her grave twelve times her leg will appear and attempt to kick you.
